p2.before: Holding official and recognized front-end certifications from Microsoft, Meta, and IBM. These certificates confirm my mastery of global standards and advanced web development technologies

about.p3: I entered the development field in 2019 and have been fully focused on front-end development since 2021. With extensive experience in challenging projects, I now build interfaces that are technically flawless and business-impactful for product growth.

p4.before: At the same time, through my educational brand
p4.after: I produce advanced web development content and share my knowledge with the developer community.
